Detailed Description

Base class for different interface mode editors of a bus interface.

virtual void BusIfInterfaceModeEditor::restoreChanges (  )  [pure virtual]

Restore the changes made in the editor back to ones in the model.

Referenced by BusIfInterfaceModeTab::restoreChanges().

virtual void BusIfInterfaceModeEditor::applyChanges (  )  [pure virtual]

Applies the changes made with the editor to the model.

After calling this function it is no longer possible to automatically restore the previous state of the model.

Note: if the editor is not in valid state nothing is changed.

Implemented in BusIfInterfaceMaster, BusIfInterfaceMonitor, BusIfInterfaceMSlave, BusIfInterfaceSlave, and BusIfInterfaceSystem.

Referenced by BusIfInterfaceModeTab::applyChanges().

void BusIfInterfaceModeEditor::updateDisplay (  )  [virtual]

Update the display for the editor.

This function should be called when the editor is displayed to the user. Base class implementation does nothing

Reimplemented in BusIfInterfaceMaster, BusIfInterfaceMonitor, and BusIfInterfaceSystem.
